title: Goodbye, First Amendment | Guests: Gov. Abbott & Mercedes Schlapp | 7/16/21
description:
Say goodbye to the First Amendment: The White House has announced it will collaborate with social media to stop “misinformation” regarding COVID-19. Canadian radio host Jerry Agar joins to discuss mass graves being found in Canada, the burning down of churches, and why Americans should care. Bill O’Reilly returns with a vengeance to discuss Cuba, the First Amendment, and the coordinated effort by the Left to push propaganda. Glenn gives his best “kitten in a bucket” impression. Texas Gov. Greg Abbott joins to discuss the Texas Democrats who fled the state, why they’ll be “arrested,” and what’s actually in the new voting bill. CPAC Now host Mercedes Schlapp shares her insight on Cuba and what its citizens are facing.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
